title: FS: American Beauty & EPDG Cigar Boxes
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: American Beauty & EPDG Cigar Boxes
posts.post_content:
$60 net to me for the American Beauty box. The EPDG BOX IS SOLD. 

T206 did not come in these, but they are cool display pieces. The EPDG metal boxes usually have more rust on them. 

The lid of the AB cigar box is fully detached, but looking online I was not able to find another example.
